item.title: Cookie Cutter Overkill Edition announced for Switch
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/cookie-cutter-overkill-edition-announced-for-switch

  • Switch

Due out this spring.

Publisher Rogue Games and developer Subcult Join have announced Cookie Cutter Overkill Edition, an enhanced version of “Techno-pop-punk” 2D hand-drawn Metroidvania game Cookie Cutter with new content and gameplay features for Switch. It will launch this spring.

Cookie Cutter first launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on December 14, 2023.

“We’ve been blown away by the positive response to Cookie Cutter and we’re very excited to be releasing the Overkill Edition for the Nintendo Switch,” said Rogue Games CEO Matt Casamassina in a press release. “All of the new content, features, and enhancements provide an even richer gaming experience.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Rogue Games:

Switch players will finally get their chance to punch, stab, slice, and maul enemies as Cherry, a take-no-prisoners fembot trying to survive a twisted planet on the brink of destruction.

Developed by Subcult Joint, the PAX West and NYX award-winning Cookie Cutter is a gorgeous hand-drawn techno-pop-punk post-kawaii Metroidvania. Play as the heroine Cherry on a quest for revenge as you run, jump, explore, and fight your way through a beautifully blood-soaked world.

Cookie Cutter‘s highly anticipated and requested release for the Nintendo Switch will feature an array of features, enhancements and improvements to both its gameplay and story.

These updates (and upgrades) include:

  • Fully voiced dialogue for every character in the game.
  • New map features including the ability to gauge completion status.
  • Brand new special moves and upgrades for Cherry.
  • New cinematics adding more style and background to the story.
  • Tons of gameplay tweaks and progression balancing.
  • Nintendo Switch-specific easter eggs.
  • Hidden game mode where you discuss your problems with the enemy instead of resorting to violence. -(Just kidding.)

The updates in Cookie Cutter: Overkill Edition for Switch will also be made available for the original Cookie Cutter for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer
